Name: The Trench
About the game: The Trench is a short horror experience in which you will command the Pandora submarine, exploring the depths of a trench that has been uncovered after an earthquake in the Pacific Ocean, your mission will be to retrieve all the data from a previous accident involving another submarine, 'The Neptune'. The inspiration for this experience comes from stories from H.P. Lovecraft and Cloverfield. FEATURES A short experience intended to be finished in under an hour Atmospheric and claustrophobic environment in a high tech submarine Narrative adventure following the steps of a previous accident with full voice acting Interactive terminal with on-screen controls
